description:
Over 18 000 students have taken this course on Udemy! Wolfgang is an Inspirational Speaker who walks his talk, with over 600 free videos and 7 million views on You Tube. This course is a pure 'give back' to help you change your thinking and it consists of 20 Quick Tips, each with a different theme. 10 are personally presented by Mind Shift Master Wolfgang Riebe, and the remaining 10 are themed inspirational videos containing quotations by Unknown Authors.

Topics discussed include: Greatness within You, Time & Ageing, Overcoming Greed & Selfishness, Entitlement & Scarcity Thinking Attitudes, Family Relationships, Who are you? 5 Tips on being Patient and on Forgiveness, Coping with Envy as well as Annoying People.

Quotation Videos includes themes on Life, Greatness, City Dwellers, Change, Work & Career, Nature, Friendship, Wisdom, Family & the Future.
title: How to Change Your Thinking & become more Positive
